name: Isthmus Partners
overview:
Isthmus Partners is a Dubai-based boutique firm specialized in financial strategy consulting for private companies.

Isthmus Partners offers consulting services to corporates on financial strategy, business development, restructuring and growth. It works with entrepreneurs to design and implement business plans for new ventures, helping to make their projects investment worthy.

Isthmus Partners works with institutional investors to provide advice on portfolio companies and investment opportunities.

In real estate, Isthmus Partners advises on financial feasibility studies and real estate development, from early stage to late stage projects.

Isthmus Partners carries out mandates in different geographies and offers discrete services in most cases working directly with the owners of the client companies.
